title.rendered: Ericsson Global Services Limited partners with Smile on Wheels

content.rendered: Over 200 Ericsson employees got together to celebrate the launch of the partnership with Smile Foundation, enthusiastically participating in activities like Health Quiz, Street Play and Health Check-up camps, held at their office. Ericsson Global Services Limited has joined hands with Smile Foundation to provide door-step health facilities, through its mobile hospital programme Smile on Wheels, in slums of Kolkata, Bengaluru, Chennai, Gurgaon and Noida. The projects will directly benefit 2,37,000 beneficiaries during the span of three years. The first Smile on Wheels was launched at the Ericsson Office in Noida. The Noida project will make preventive, curative and promotive health care facilities accessible in 15 slums and resettlement colonies.
